group.label: Returns
group.comment: In order to use the Channable Item API, you have to set the API settings on the store level where you want to import the orders from Channable. The settings are only visible when you have the right store-view selected through the store switcher on the top left.

field.label: Webhooks
field.comment: Copy and paste the Webhook URL to configure your Magento Store in your ChannableMarketplace account. Make sure that you copy the complete URL as the URL is partly hidden because of the length.

field.label: Magento Credits and Channable Returns
field.comment: Within this function, you have the ability to associate Channable Returns with Magento Credit Memos for orders processed through Channable. This facilitates a more efficient management of credit memos and refunds. With the options provided below, you can customize and configure this automation process according to your specific requirements.

field.label: Show return block on credit memo page
field.comment: Enabling this option will incorporate a return block into the credit memo creation page specifically for Channable orders that have an associated Channable return.

field.label: Automatically match Returns
field.comment: Activating this option will automatically approve 'pending' returns upon the creation of a credit memo for the respective order. This action will override the return block selection option from the if it is enabled. Enable this feature when you have established processes in place to automate your credit memo workflow.

field.label: Creditmemo completed returns
field.comment: When enabled, a credit memo will be created automatically for returns imported with the status 'complete'. These returns are handled and fulfilled directly by the marketplace.
